import Tabs from "@theme/Tabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Tabs>
  <TabItem value="curl" label="curl" default>

```bash
curl https://scroll-mainnet.infura.io/v3/<YOUR-API-KEY> \
  -X POST \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "debug_traceBlock", "params": ["", {"tracer": "callTracer"}], "id": 1}'
```

  </TabItem>
  <TabItem value="WSS" label="WSS" default>

```bash
wscat -c wss://scroll-mainnet.infura.io/ws/v3/<YOUR-API-KEY> -x'{"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "debug_traceBlock", "params": ["", {"tracer": "callTracer"}], "id": 1}'
```

  </TabItem>
</Tabs>
